description:
Like us on Facebook and/or Follow us on Twitter. Message us to let us know you liked us, or Tweet us @sr_elearning.

Link to Our Facebook Page

Link to Our Twitter Profile

Stone River eLearning

_____________________________________________________________________________________

Would you like to build your own custom content management system? Then use your PHP knowledge to add this new skill to your toolbox!

This course walks you through every step needed to create a fully functional content management system from scratch.

New to PHP?

If so, then first take our course: Learn PHP Programming From Scratch

That course will give you the basics of PHP as well as offering a huge number of useful PHP skills. It is by far the most comprehensive PHP course on the internet.

Valuable Job Skills

Web development skills like developing a CMS are always in high demand. Learn a new skill that can serve a purpose for you in real life, whether for your job or your business.
title: How to Build a CMS with PHP
